title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Mezzaro in a multicolored design on a white ground. Center shows a large scale flowering tree flanked by a smaller tree on either side. Floral sprays, animals, insects, and birds are scattered over the ground. Floral border with small inset landscapes with animals. Urns and vases in the foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:

19th century. Medium: cotton
